thread.title: A camera had caught Gurdaspur attackers
thread.title_full: A camera had caught Gurdaspur attackers - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: A camera had caught Gurdaspur attackers
text:
GURDASPUR (Punjab): The three terrorists who created mayhem here on Monday before being eliminated were caught on a CCTV camera whose footage surfaced on Tuesday in a significant development in the attack case.
READ ALSO: Gunmen in Army uniform attack police station, bus in Punjab's Gurdaspur, one reportedly dead
The 14-second video footage shows three men, wearing Army, having big backpacks and carrying AK assault rifles, walking down the road at 4:55am on Monday.
The images were captured by a CCTV camera placed at a shop at Taragarh intersection in Dinanagar area, just before they entered this Punjab town bordering Pakistan, SSP Gurdaspur G S Toor said on Tuesday.
READ ALSO: Gurdaspur terrorists sneaked in from Pakistan to launch attack
During investigations, it emerged that the terrorists unsuccessfully tried to snatch a mini truck (tempo) from its driver and then opened fire on a moving bus, Toor said.
A man heading to buy vegetables in his Maruti car became their target. The car owner Kamaljit Singh said they pulled him out of his vehicle and threw him on the road.
READ ALSO - Punjab terror attack: Bus driver saved many lives
Earlier this morning, Punjab police defused two grenades seized near the operation site at Dinanagar police station complex.
Seven people, including an SP, were among killed in Monday's terror strike that lasted around 12 hours. http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/followceleb.cms?alias=Gurdaspur terrorists,Gurdaspur terror attack,Gurdaspur Attack Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
